Odvzemi krvi znova v mestu
05 Nov 2019, 14:14 by Alenka Penjak

Odvzemi krvi se vračajo v Piran. Prav od danes je namreč znova na voljo storitev, ki so jo Pirančani pogrešali od maja letos in jih je tudi skrbelo, ali bodo izgubili to zdravstveno storitev.



Odvzemi krvi se vračajo v Piran. Foto: Sonja Ribolica

PIRAN > “Ne,” zatrjuje Matjaž Krajnc, direktor Zdravstvenega doma Piran, “odvzemov krvi v Piranu ne bomo ukinili.”
Staro spletno obvestilo, ki je uporabnike Zdravstvenega doma Piran obveščalo, da odvzemi krvi v Piranu ne bodo več možni od letošnjega maja naprej, ne straši več vseh, ki iščejo pravilne informacije. Že od danes, zatrjuje Krajnc, je možno na Cankarjevem nabrežju dati kri.
Odvzemno mesto v Piranu je bilo do poletja zaprto zaradi kadrovskih težav, zadnje dneve pa zaradi selitve iz začasne lokacije v ZD Lucija. Poslej je vse po starem in bolniki, ki morajo redno dajati kri, so o spremembah že obveščeni, zatrjuje direktor Krajnc.
Medtem se je končala prva faza gradnje novega zdravstvenega doma v Luciji in začela druga, kar je s seboj prineslo tudi nekaj sprememb. Dnevna urgenca je poslej v novozgrajenem prizidku v Luciji, vanjo pa se vstopa z novozgrajenega parkirišča. Direktor Krajnc namreč opozarja, da pacienti iščejo stari vhod in so nemalokrat zmedeni.

Get blood back in town again
05 Nov 2019, 14:14 by Alenka Penjak

Blood donations are returned to Piran. As of today, the service that Pirancans have been missing since May this year is again available, and they were worried whether they would lose this health service.



Blood donations are returned to Piran. Photo by Sonja Ribolica

PIRAN> "No," says Matjaz Krajnc, director of the Piran Health Center, "we will not stop blood donations in Piran."
An old online announcement informing users of the Piran Health Center that blood donations in Piran will no longer be possible from this May onwards no longer frightens anyone seeking the correct information. From today, says Krajnc, blood can be donated on Cankar embankment.
The withdrawal site in Piran was closed until summer due to staffing problems, and in recent days due to the relocation from a temporary location to the Lucija ZD. Everything is old now, and patients who have to donate regularly are informed of the changes, claims director Krajnc.
In the meantime, the first phase of the construction of a new health center in Lucia was completed and a second one began, which brought with it some changes. The daily emergency is now in the newly built extension in Lucia and is being entered from the newly built parking lot. Director Krajnc points out that patients are looking for an old entrance and are often confused.
